Name: Battle Bruise 2
About the game: Fight atop montain of corpses again! With your own helicopter, you will be traveling on 32 stages, collecting gold and spending everything on loot b... I mean, nice and legal game machines, to try your luck! Try to collect 20 unique weapons, fight 4 bosses and fill your space with random junk. Back again, not messy, but MESS ITSELF!
